pages.title: Instant Health
pages.text: Needs a glistering melon to craft. Heals 4 health points per level.

$(br)Upgrade Costs:$(br)$(li)Instant Health I - 1$(li)Instant Health II - 8$(li)Instant Health III - 16$(li)Instant Health IV - 32$(li)Instant Health V - 64$(li)Instant Health VI - 96$(li)Instant Health VII - 128$(li)Instant Health VIII - 160
